execution_quality: Agent correctly interpreted an incomplete/truncated shutdown command and initiated proper shutdown messaging to team members.
work_category: Team shutdown initiation through incomplete user request.
summary: Agent handled a truncated user shutdown request by proactively initiating shutdown messaging to teammates, which resulted in successful team termination. The agent demonstrated good error recovery by inferring intent from incomplete input.
follow_up_pattern: Teammate approved shutdown, leading to team termination.
